{{Dangerous version|multiple=true|edition=java|version=release|type=vulnerability|Creative mode players with modified clients can create signs that can run any command. '''1.8.3'''<ref name="CrashFix">{{tweet|SeargeDP|568778496627122178|Minecraft 1.8.3 is now available. It fixes a serious bug in 1.8.2 that could cause crashes on world load.|February 20, 2015}}</ref> is an update to {{JE}} released on February 20, 2015,<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2015/02/minecraft-1-8-2-is-now-available/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150310004902/https://www.mojang.com/2015/02/minecraft-1-8-2-is-now-available/|title=Minecraft 1.8.3 is now available|author=Searge|website=Mojang.com|date=February 19, 2015}}</ref> to fix a bug in [[Java Edition 1.8.2|1.8.2]] that caused a crash on world load.<ref name="CrashFix"/> 1.8.3 is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.8|1.8]] – [[Java Edition 1.8.2|1.8.2]] servers.<ref>http://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/113776184629/minecraft-1-8-3</ref>
